projects.name: Portland Community Garden
projects.description: Looking for money to make flowers.

projects.name: Fix The Highway
projects.description: The highway sucks, lets make it better so we can drive.
projects.allocation: $5,000,000 for pavement. James VanWinkle managerial fee = $20,000,000.

projects.name: Get Julia to Rio
projects.description: Julia has always wanted to go to Rio. I don't have a highway near me to panhandle on, until James VanWinkle finishes his project at least, so I'll have to resort to online panhandling!
projects.allocation: $2,000 for plane ticket. $2,000 for food and shopping.
projects.rewards: Julia will get a tattoo of your name and include it in a picture with my signature!
